messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] old movies
messages.msgSnippet: ... How about some of the old Elvis musicals or Bye Bye Birdie? Life is good. ~Mary The miracle is not to walk on water. The miracle is to walk on the green
messages.messageBody:
>>My eight year old daughter has just discovered Grease. She LOVED it. I
>>want to see if she'd like other movies along the same lines and also
>>thought I'd see what I could find about that *era* that we could look at.
>>Maybe we could sew a poodle skirt :) Any suggestions?>>

How about some of the old Elvis musicals or Bye Bye Birdie?

Life is good.
~Mary

"The miracle is not to walk on water. The miracle is to walk on the green
earth, dwelling deeply in the present moment and feeling truly alive."

~ Thich Nhat Hanh
